text:
@realDonaldTrump it wasn't "people coming in from China" - you let US citizens come back in, and THEY are the ones who brought coronavirus in, causing nearly 100,000 deaths, and well over 1 million cases.

remember that you don't just get over coronavirus - it can leave painful, lasting effects.
